subSections.title: Derived characters
subSections.text:
* [[Index:Chinese radical/夂]]
* {{l|mul|[[冬]], [[务]], [[各]], [[𪢶]], [[𢁙]], [[㣊]], [[𢩸]], [[𣅈]], [[条]], [[𤰅]], [[𧈸]], [[𮗺]], [[𥇠]], [[𧍸]]}} <!-- Characters not found under Index:Chinese radical/夂 -->

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: This character is usually written as the top component of a character such as in {{l|mul|[[冬]], [[各]], [[㣊]], [[夅]], [[夆]], [[备]]}} or as a side component in {{l|mul|[[处]], [[処]]}} and is not to be confused with {{l|mul|夊}} which is often written as the bottom component of a character or {{l|mul|攵}} which is often written as the right component of a character.
